definition: surname Cheng/Cheng (c. 2000 BC), third of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
to bear/to carry/to hold/to continue/to undertake/to take charge/owing to/due to/to receive
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]

sentences.english: We'll build a raft and sail on the Pacific Ocean, like Kon Tiki.
sentences.chinese: 咱們會造條划子飛行在承平洋上，就像康蒂基號同樣。

sentences.english: The scenery is very beautiful in the small islands in the Pacific Oceans.
sentences.chinese: 承平洋上一些小島的景色十分柔美。

definition: courtier's or minister's form of address for the current Emperor
Northern Yan of the Sixteen Kingdoms (409-436)
to suppress rebellion and quell unrest/to bring calm and order to/calm and peaceful/tranquil
the (rightful) emperor/"Son of Heaven" (traditional English translation)
Taishang Huang/Retired Emperor/father of the reigning emperor/fig. puppet master
